overview: He's one of the world's most beautiful guys. His piercing eyes can send passions soaring even before he reveals his spectacular, well muscled body. He is a god. He is Lukas Ridgeston! In Boy 2, he stars alongside seven of Slovakia's most desirable males in an erotic fantasy spectacular. With casting by Bel Ami, it's not just hot, it's beautiful.
title: Boy 2: Boys At Play
